meanings.definition: People who educate their children at home instead of sending them to a traditional school.
meanings.sent1: Many homeschoolers enjoy the flexibility of learning at home.
meanings.sent2: The homeschoolers in our community organize regular meetups for social activities.
meanings.sent3: The homeschoolers decided to have a picnic in the park for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: In a world of schools, homeschoolers are the architects of their own educational journey.
meanings.sent5: The group of homeschoolers painted a mural together to showcase their creativity.

meanings.definition: The act of teaching children at home instead of sending them to a traditional school.
meanings.sent1: Homeschoolers believe in the power of personalized education for their children.
meanings.sent2: The rise in homeschoolers has led to an increase in resources for home education.
meanings.sent3: The homeschoolers' classroom was the living room, complete with a cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of education, homeschoolers are the pioneers of a new frontier.
meanings.sent5: The homeschoolers' dedication to teaching shines through in their daily lessons.
